<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codemetrics/#a8510fa518cbd0c195328d2fc8dbb5318">NumRets</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We never want to inline functions that contain an indirectbr.  This is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// incorrect because all the blockaddress&#39;s (in static global initializers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for example) would be referring to the original function, and this indirect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// jump would jump from the inlined copy of the function into the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function which is extremely undefined behavior.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This logic isn&#39;t really right; we can safely inline functions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with indirectbr&#39;s as long as no other function or global references the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blockaddress of a block within the current function.  And as a QOI issue,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if someone is using a blockaddress without an indirectbr, and that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reference somehow ends up in another function or global, we probably</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// don&#39;t want to inline this function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codemetrics/#a61cad01cfbfee0f1ac885df62557c708">notDuplicatable</a> |= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;IndirectBrInst&gt;</a>(BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remember NumInsts for this BB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> NumInstsThisBB = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codemetrics/#ae0c34d2d9e5ea7c30caf329b1477054a">NumInsts</a> - NumInstsBeforeThisBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codemetrics/#a905cd2deb038f9e0d10ee4a708470943">NumBBInsts</a>&#91;BB&#93; = NumInstsThisBB;</span></CodeLine>
